Diagnosis - Remote Treatments
description: We will send you all you need for you to collect your own biological oral samples and Dr.Klein will train you through a zoom call. You send us back the samples and the Dr. studies them thoroughly under the microscope this way we can present the treatment plan
bottom_text: Many times its just one cause and other times there might be more than one cause.

title: OZONOTERAPIA
bottom_text: Este manantial de oxigeno mata a las bacterias que producen mal olor midiendo con un cromatografo y microscopio ( doble control ) lo que se mata para alcanzar el equilibrio y asi calibrar la flora oral normal , neutralizando de inmediato el aliento.

title: Test in vitro de diabetes y prediabetes en el momento en el consultorio

description: Personas de todos los paises del mundo nos visitan para diagnosticar- tratar su halitosis ( mal aliento ) y de paso conocer Miami.
